languages.text: "Все, что оттачивает навыки и инстинкты Глейто и полезно при исполнении долга".
"It's everything that can hone Glaito's skills and instincts or otherwise prove useful in our duty."
languages.original_text: "Все, что оттачивает навыки и инстинкты Глейто и полезно при исполнении долга".

traits.locale_text: "It's everything that can hone Glaito's skills and instincts or otherwise prove useful in our duty."
"It's everything that can hone Glaito's skills and instincts or otherwise prove useful in our duty."
"It's everything that can hone Glaito's skills and instincts or otherwise prove useful in our duty."
"It's everything that can hone Glaito's skills and instincts or otherwise prove useful in our duty."
"It's everything that can hone Glaito's skills and instincts or otherwise prove useful in our duty."
"It's everything that can hone Glaito's skills and instincts or otherwise prove useful in our duty."

languages.text: 「グライトの技術や本能を磨くもの、あるいは私たちの任務に役立つものすべてです」
languages.original_text: "It's everything that can hone Glaito's skills and instincts or otherwise prove useful in our duty."

traits.locale_text: 「グライトの技術や本能を磨くもの、あるいは私たちの任務に役立つものすべてです」

languages.text: "Alles, was Glaitos Fähigkeiten und Instinkte verbessert oder uns im Einsatz anderweitig nützlich sein kann."
languages.original_text: "It's everything that can hone Glaito's skills and instincts or otherwise prove useful in our duty."

traits.locale_text: "Alles, was Glaitos Fähigkeiten und Instinkte verbessert oder uns im Einsatz anderweitig nützlich sein kann."

languages.text: « Ce sont les seules choses qui lui permettent d'affûter ses compétences et ses instincts, tout en étant utile dans le cadre de nos missions. »
languages.original_text: "It's everything that can hone Glaito's skills and instincts or otherwise prove useful in our duty."

traits.locale_text: « Ce sont les seules choses qui lui permettent d'affûter ses compétences et ses instincts, tout en étant utile dans le cadre de nos missions. »

languages.text: «Todo lo que sirva para pulir las habilidades y el instinto de Glaito, o que de alguna manera resulte útil en el cumplimiento de nuestro deber».
languages.original_text: "It's everything that can hone Glaito's skills and instincts or otherwise prove useful in our duty."

traits.locale_text: «Todo lo que sirva para pulir las habilidades y el instinto de Glaito, o que de alguna manera resulte útil en el cumplimiento de nuestro deber».

languages.text: “无论做什么，目的都是为了磨炼格雷托的技术与天性，又或许是为了我们的职责。”
languages.original_text: "It's everything that can hone Glaito's skills and instincts or otherwise prove useful in our duty."

traits.locale_text: “无论做什么，目的都是为了磨炼格雷托的技术与天性，又或许是为了我们的职责。”

languages.text: "Glaito'nun becerilerini ve içgüdülerini geliştirebilecek ya da görevimize farklı açılardan faydalı olabilecek her şey buna dâhildir."
languages.original_text: "It's everything that can hone Glaito's skills and instincts or otherwise prove useful in our duty."

traits.locale_text: "Glaito'nun becerilerini ve içgüdülerini geliştirebilecek ya da görevimize farklı açılardan faydalı olabilecek her şey buna girer"

languages.original_text: "It's everything that can hone Glaito's skills and instincts or otherwise prove useful in our duty."
